text: @kevinoflincoln @leesasleep @UPS_UK Hi Kevin, so sorry to hear you're having issues with delivery. Please can you DM us with your order no. or email support@leesa.co.uk so we can look into this and get your mattress out to you at the soonest convenient time. We'll also pass on your feedback to our ops team.
@limwen_elensar @UPS_UK Hi Clare, please can you send an email over to support@leesa.co.uk with your order number and we'll try and help out with this
@btnpropertyblog @UPSHelp Hi there, if you can send us an email at support@leesa.co.uk we should be able to help you with this. So sorry for any convenience caused!

@btnpropertyblog @UPSHelp If you can give our customer experience team a call on 0800 011 9500 or email us at support@leesa.co.uk with your order number, we'd like to see if there is anything we can do to help ensure it's delivered at a convenient time for you.
